body:
Given a spack package, have a way to create a spack.yaml for development of that package

### Rationale

People have put a lot of work into describing their packages in the package.py file, we should be able to reuse that work

### Description

Something like `spack env create --from-package foo`

Creates a named environment `foo` with all the dependencies of package `foo`, that developers can then copy into their project under version control.

### Additional information
This probably won't be fully functional until environments are co-concretized.
title: spack environmentize my package
